actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a student internship program to offer students practical involvement with elected officials on local and State levels and with Members of Congress.

summary.text: Political Leadership Intern Program Act - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to authorize the Commissioner of Education to make grants to institutions of higher education for the development and operation of student internship programs in the offices of elected officials at the local, State, and Federal levels of government.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a student internship program to offer students practical involvement with elected officials on local and State levels and with Members of Congress.
